metadata.Title: CVE-2021-31879 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: GNU Wget through 1.21.1 does not omit the Authorization header upon a redirect to a different origin, a related issue to CVE-2018-1000007.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> no upstream fix as of 2022-01-05 also see previous upstream bug from 2019

criterions.comment: wget package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
